name: starlight choices
description:
starlight choices

starlight choices is an interactive fan story focused on Coco from Shirahama Kamome's manga, Witch Hat Atelier.

It contains a total of 4,386 words but on average, it should be 2.1k words per route you choose.

Summary:

There is a young girl named Coco and she has been cursed to learn magic.

There is a young girl named Coco and she has been blessed to learn magic.

She has lost her mother to do so.

What would she do in order to get her back?

The stars wonder so and decide, they would like to find out.
